#Program

n = int(input())

printers = 0
days = 0

while True:
    days += 1
    printers += 1
    n -= printers #n = n - printers
    if n <= 0:
        print(days)
        break

def main():
    n = int(input())
    if n == 1:
        print(1)
    else:
        print(n + (n - 1) // 9)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(next(sys.stdin).strip())
    printers = [1]
    days = 0
    while sum(printers) <= n:
        days += 1
        new_printers = 0
        for i in range(len(printers)):
            if printers[i] > 1:
                printers[i] -= 1
                new_printers += printers[i]
                printers[i] = 1
        printers.extend([1]*new_printers)
    print(days)

main()

from sys import stdin, stdout

n = int(stdin.readline().strip())

printers = 1
days = 0
while printers < n:
    days += 1
    printers += printers

stdout.write(str(days + 1))

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    printers = [1]
    days = 0
    while sum(printers) < n:
        days += 1
        new_printers = 0
        while printers:
            if printers[-1] > 1:
                printers[-1] -= 1
                new_printers += 1
            else:
                printers.pop()
        printers.extend([1]*new_printers)
    print days

main()

    ans = 0

    while p < n:
        p *= 2
        ans += 1
    print(ans + 1)

printers = 1

def main():
    n = int(input())
    d = 1
    p = 1
    while p <= n:
        p *= 2
        d += 1
    print(d)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    day = 1
    num_printer = 1
    num_statue = 0
    while num_statue < n:
        num_statue += num_printer
        num_printer += 1
        day += 1
    print(day)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
import sys

def main():
    n = int(next(sys.stdin))
    printers = [1]
    days = 0
    while sum(printers) < n:
        days += 1
        new_printers = 0
        while printers:
            if printers[-1] > 1:
                printers[-1] -= 1
                new_printers += 1
            else:
                printers.pop()
        printers.extend([1]*new_printers)
    print(days)

main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    day = 1
    num_printers = 1
    num_statues = 1
    while num_statues < n:
        num_statues += num_printers
        num_printers += 1
        day += 1
    print(day)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# Program

n = int(input())

printers = 0
days = 0

while True:
    days += 1
    printers += 1
    n -= printers
    if n <= 0:
        print(days)
        break


def main():
    n = int(input())
    d = 1
    p = 1
    while p < n:
        p *= 2
        d += 1
    print(d)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python

import sys


def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
    print(n * 2)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
